trans-unit.source: The list of operating systems supported is subject to frequent changes. For up-to-date information, see the Compatibility Guide.

Pour obtenir les informations les plus récentes, voir le Guide de compatibilité.

trans-unit.source: Central Site with No Remote Office

seg-source.mrk: Central Site with No Remote Office

alt-trans.seg-source: Central Site with no Remote Office

trans-unit.source: In a basic configuration (<MadCap:xref href="#hss_basic_config" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>), <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> agents from a single site connect to <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> to send new and modified data blocks. Blocks are compressed for improved performances.

seg-source.mrk: In a basic configuration (<MadCap:xref href="#hss_basic_config" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>), <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> agents from a single site connect to <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> to send new and modified data blocks.
Blocks are compressed for improved performances.

target.mrk: Dans une configuration de base (<MadCap:xref href="#hss_basic_config" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>), les agents <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> d’un seul site se connectent au <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> pour envoyer les blocs de données ayant été modifiés.
Les blocs sont compressés pour améliorer les performances.

alt-trans.seg-source: In a basic configuration, <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> agents from a single site connect to <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> to send new and modified data blocks.
alt-trans.target: Dans une configuration de base, les agents <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> d’un seul site se connectent au <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> pour envoyer les blocs de données ayant été modifiés.

trans-unit.source: Central Site with Remote Offices Backing Up to a Data Center

seg-source.mrk: Central Site with Remote Offices Backing Up to a Data Center

target.mrk: Site centralisé avec bureaux distants et sauvegarde vers un Data Center

alt-trans.seg-source: Central Site with Remote Offices backing up to a Data Center
alt-trans.target: Site centralisé avec bureaux distants et sauvegarde vers un Data Center

trans-unit.source: In an advanced configuration (<MadCap:xref href="#hss_adv_config" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>), for instance in a Remote Office Branch Office environment, clients from several sites send new data blocks to a centralized <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: In an advanced configuration (<MadCap:xref href="#hss_adv_config" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>), for instance in a Remote Office Branch Office environment, clients from several sites send new data blocks to a centralized <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Dans une configuration avancée (<MadCap:xref href="#hss_adv_config" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>), par exemple dans un environnement avec des bureaux distants, les clients de plusieurs sites envoient les nouveaux blocs de données vers un <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> centralisé.

alt-trans.seg-source: In an advanced configuration, for instance in a Remote Office Branch Office environment, clients from several sites send new data blocks to a centralized <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
alt-trans.target: Dans une configuration avancée, par exemple dans un environnement avec des bureaux distants, les clients de plusieurs sites envoient les nouveaux blocs de données vers un <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> centralisé.

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in an advanced configuration with remote offices

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in an advanced configuration with remote offices

target.mrk: Le <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> dans une configuration avancée avec des bureaux distants

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can duplicate the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> contents to tape or disk for long term storage.

seg-source.mrk: In addition, you can duplicate the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> contents to tape or disk for long term storage.

target.mrk: De plus, le contenu du <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> peut être dupliqué sur bande ou sur disque pour un stockage à long terme.

trans-unit.source: Remote Offices Backed Up Locally and Replicated to a Data Center

seg-source.mrk: Remote Offices Backed Up Locally and Replicated to a Data Center

target.mrk: Bureaux distants sauvegardés localement et répliqués vers un Data Center

alt-trans.seg-source: Remote Offices backed up locally and replicated to a Data Center
alt-trans.target: Bureaux distants sauvegardés localement et repliqués vers un Data Center

trans-unit.source: In this configuration (see Figure), clients are deduplicated locally. The local s are then replicated through a Wide Area Network to a central in the Data Center.

seg-source.mrk: In this configuration (<MadCap:xref href="#hss_remote_config_local_dedup" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>), clients are deduplicated locally.
The local s are then replicated through a Wide Area Network to a central in the Data Center.

target.mrk: Dans cette configuration (<MadCap:xref href="#hss_remote_config_local_dedup" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>), les clients sont dédupliqués en local.
Les Serveurs HyperStream locaux sont alors répliqués via un Wide Area Network (WAN) vers un central dans le Data Center.

alt-trans.seg-source: In this configuration, clients are deduplicated locally.
alt-trans.target: Dans cette configuration, les clients sont dédupliqués localement.

alt-trans.seg-source: The local s are then replicated through a Wide Area Network to a central in the Data Center.
alt-trans.target: Les <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" style="font-weight: normal;" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />s locaux sont alors répliqués via un Wide Area Network (WAN) vers un <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> central dans le Data Center.
